field.value: [Castle.Components.Validator] resource message fallback flawed in CachedValidationRegistry?

field.name: description
field.value:
On my environment, ValidatorRunnerTestCase choke on InheritanceTest:
------ Test started: Assembly: Castle.Components.Validator.Tests.dll ------
TestCase 'Castle.Components.Validator.Tests.ValidatorRunnerTestCase.InheritanceTest' failed: System.NullReferenceException : Object reference not set to an instance of an object. C:\home\dev\src\dotnet\libs\castle\Components\Validator\Castle.Components.Validator\Validators\GroupNotEmptyValidator.cs(117,0): at Castle.Components.Validator.GroupNotEmptyValidator.BuildErrorMessage() C:\home\dev\src\dotnet\libs\castle\Components\Validator\Castle.Components.Validator\Validators\GroupNotEmptyValidator.cs(95,0): at Castle.Components.Validator.GroupNotEmptyValidator.get_ErrorMessage() C:\home\dev\src\dotnet\libs\castle\Components\Validator\Castle.Components.Validator\ValidatorRunner.cs(223,0): at Castle.Components.Validator.ValidatorRunner.PerformValidation(Object objectInstance, IEnumerable`1 validators, ErrorSummary summaryToPopulate) C:\home\dev\src\dotnet\libs\castle\Components\Validator\Castle.Components.Validator\ValidatorRunner.cs(128,0): at Castle.Components.Validator.ValidatorRunner.IsValid(Object objectInstance, RunWhen runWhen) C:\home\dev\src\dotnet\libs\castle\Components\Validator\Castle.Components.Validator\ValidatorRunner.cs(104,0): at Castle.Components.Validator.ValidatorRunner.IsValid(Object objectInstance) C:\home\dev\src\dotnet\libs\castle\Components\Validator\Castle.Components.Validator.Tests\ValidatorRunnerTestCase.cs(66,0): at Castle.Components.Validator.Tests.ValidatorRunnerTestCase.InheritanceTest()
0 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped, took 0,98 seconds. ------
Looking further, it seems that the fallback for invariant culture does not work if message is not found in current culture and the culture is available, the culprit seems to be CachedValidationRegistry.GetStringFromResource method which should use
System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture instead of Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture at line 147.
Also, I think the WillFallbackToDefaultResourceIfNotFoundOnCustomOne test in CachedValidationRegistryTestCase is flawed since it switch to invariant culture instead of switching to a culture that doesn't exists or a culture where the message doesn't exists.
It could be fixed by switching to a culture for which messages ressource is not provided, I've tried successfully with CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture("mk-MK").
